Statements.Statement: WITH aggr AS ( SELECT REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, Added, 111), '/','-') + '-' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEPART(hh, Added)) AS [Key], COUNT(Id) [Count] FROM WHERE StatusName = @statusName GROUP BY REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, Added, 111), '/','-') + '-' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEPART(hh, Added)) ) SELECT [Key], [Count] FROM aggr WITH (NOLOCK) where [Key] >= @minKey and [Key] <= @maxKey;

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T.Added DESC) AS row_number FROM AS T
) AS tbl WHERE tbl.row_number BETWEEN @offset and @offset + @limit
SELECT Id AS DbId, Content, Added, ExpiresAt, Retries FROM WHERE Id = @id
UPDATE SET StatusName=@statusName WHERE Id IN @ids
UPDATE SET Retries=@retries, ExpiresAt=@expiresAt, StatusName=@statusName, Content=@content WHERE Id = @id
DELETE TOP (@batchCount) FROM WITH (READPAST) WHERE ExpiresAt < @timeout
SELECT TOP (200) Id, Content, Retries, Added FROM WITH (READPAST) WHERE Retries < @retries AND Version = @version AND Added < @added AND (StatusName = 'Failed' OR StatusName = 'Scheduled')

SELECT Id,Content,Retries,Added,ExpiresAt FROM WITH (UPDLOCK,READPAST) WHERE Version = @version AND ((ExpiresAt < @twoMinutesLater AND StatusName = 'Delayed') OR (ExpiresAt < @oneMinutesAgo AND StatusName = 'Queued'))
